MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: www.contoso.com. 3600 IN A 134.170.185.46 www.contoso.com. 3600 IN A 134.170.188.221
PS C:\> Add-AzureDnsRecordConfig -RecordSet $rs -Ipv4Address 134.170.185.46 PS C:\> Add-AzureDnsRecordConfig -RecordSet $rs -Ipv4Address 134.170.188.221

PS C:\> Get-AzureDnsRecordSet –Name www –RecordType A -ZoneName contoso.com -ResourceGroupName MyAzureResourceGroup
Name : www ZoneName : contoso.com ResourceGroupName : MyAzureResourceGroup Ttl : 3600 Etag : 68e78da2-4d74-413e-8c3d-331ca48246d9 RecordType : A Records : {134.170.185.46, 134.170.188.221} Tags : {}

C:\> nslookup www.contoso.com ns1-01.azure-dns.com
Server: ns1-01.azure-dns.com Address: 208.76.47.1
Name: www.contoso.com Addresses: 134.170.185.46 134.170.188.221
